title: The Strans Curse
description: The children are off to college, and Bill and Monica need a new hobby. Paranormal investigating looks like a hoot. Theyâ€™ve taken the classes, bought the equipment, and formed the New York Paranormal Investigations Group. None of these can prepare them for what they will discover at the Stonewater Mansion. It will change them forever.
author: Bryon Decker
